name: Aggron
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Aggron by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Altaria
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Celebi
Attack1Text: Look at the top 5 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Drapion
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokemon between turns.

name: Mamoswine
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Nidoking
AbilityText: Nidoking gets +20 HP for each Nidoqueen you have in play.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Porygon-Z
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. This power can't be used if Porygon-Z is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If Porygon-Z has no Rainbow Energy attached to it, Porygon-Z does 20 damage to itself and Porygon-Z is now Confused.

name: Rapidash
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned and can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Solrock
AbilityText: If you have Lunatone in play, damage counters can't be removed from any Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Damage counters can still be moved.)
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Spiritomb
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Spiritomb from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Your opponent shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws 6 cards.
Attack1Text: Choose Grass Fire Water Lightning Psychic Fighting Darkness Metal or Colorless type. Put 1 damage counter on each Pokemon your opponent has in play of the type you chose.

name: Venomoth
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. If tails, your Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Venomoth is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Victreebel
AbilityText: As long as Victreebel is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Active Pokemon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless more.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Poisoned. Remove 3 damage counters from Victreebel.

name: Ambipom
Attack1Text: Choose 2 cards from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the cards you chose, then have your opponent shuffle those cards into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 cards from your hand. (If you can't discard 2 cards from your hand, this attack does nothing.)

name: Banette
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon and put it in the Lost Zone.
Attack2Text: Count the number of cards in your opponent's hand. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Bronzong
Attack1Text: Search your deck for both halves of a Pokemon LEGEND, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy card attached to Bronzong to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Carnivine
Attack1Text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Remove 3 damage counters from Carnivine. The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Ditto
AbilityText: The number of Benched Pokemon your opponent can have is now 4. If your opponent has 5 Benched Pokemon, your opponent must discard 1 of them and all cards attached to it.

name: Dragonite
Attack1Text: Remove all Special Conditions from Dragonite.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing. If both of them are heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Dugtrio
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Fighting Energy attached to Dugtrio. This attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Electivire
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Electivire.
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon that has any Energy cards attached to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Elekid
AbilityText: As long as Elekid is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Elekid by attacks.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance. Elekid is now Asleep.

name: Golduck
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Golduck, remove 2 damage counters from Golduck.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to all of your Pokemon.

name: Grumpig
Attack1Text: Your opponent can't use any Poke-Powers on his or her Pokemon during his or her next turn.
Attack2Text: Your opponent flips a coin for each of his or her Benched Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage times the number of tails. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Kricketune
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. If 1 of them is heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage. If 2 of them are heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage. If all of them are heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 100 more damage.

name: Lunatone
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Lunatone does 60 damage to itself.

name: Machamp
Attack1Text: You may do 40 damage plus 20 more damage. If you do, Machamp does 20 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Fighting Energy attached to Machamp.

name: Magmortar
Attack1Text: For each Fire Energy attached to Magmortar, discard the top card from your opponent's deck. Then, flip a coin. If tail, discard all Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Nidoqueen
Attack1Text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.
Attack2Text: If you have more Prize cards left than your opponent, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Pidgeot
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, the attack cost of each of the Defending Pokemon's attacks is ColorlessColorless more.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Sharpedo
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your opponent discards all card from his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Sharpedo.

name: Wailord
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, remove 3 damage counters from Wailord.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, count the remaining HP of the Defending Pokemon and Wailord. If the Defending Pokemon has fewer remaining HP than Wailord, this attack does 50 damage plus 50 more damage.

name: Dragonair
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokemon, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Electabuzz
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Lightning Energy attached to Electabuzz.

name: Electrode
Attack2Text: You may do 40 damage plus 60 more damage. If you do, discard all Lightning Energy attached to Electrode.

name: Haunter
Attack1Text: Put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

name: Kangaskhan
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Lairon
Attack1Text: Lairon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Lickilicky
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon for each Energy attached to Lickilicky. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Lickilicky. The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Luvdisc
Attack1Text: Each player draws and reveals the top card of his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, remove 1 damage counter from the Defending Pokemon.

name: Machoke
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Magby
AbilityText: As long as Magby is Asleep, prevents all damage done to Magby by attacks.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned. Magby is now Asleep.

name: Magmar
Attack1Text: Each player discards the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 20 damage times the number of Energy cards discarded in this way.

name: Magneton
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Marowak
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

name: Nidorina
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Nidorino
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Pidgeotto
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Piloswine
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Porygon2
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you play Porygon2 from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may search your deck for a Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Tentacruel
Attack1Text: If Tentacruel evolved from Tentacool during this turn, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Unown
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Unown from your hand onto your Bench, remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokemon.

name: Wailmer
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Weepinbell
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and discard it.

name: Yanmega
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Switch Yanmega with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Aipom
Attack1Text: Draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent.

name: Aron
Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your deck. Then, remove 2 damage counters from Aron.

name: Bellsprout
Attack1Text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Bellsprout does 10 damage to itself.

name: Bronzor
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Bronzor during your opponent's next turn.

name: Carvanha
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Carvanha's Bite attack's base damage is 40.

name: Cubone
AbilityText: Any damage done to Cubone by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 20 for each Marowak in your discard pile (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Diglett
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Diglett during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dratini
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Gastly
Attack1Text: Put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Illumise
Attack1Text: Remove 3 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Volbeat you have in play. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Lickitung
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Machop
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Magnemite
Attack1Text: Switch Magnemite with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Nidoran â
Attack1Text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 1 Pokemon you find there, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Nidoran â
Attack1Text: If Nidoran â is on your Bench, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Pidgey
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle Pidgey and all cards attached to it back into your deck.

name: Porygon
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to Porygon and remove 4 damage counters from Porygon.

name: Psyduck
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 30 damage to 1 of your Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Shuppet
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Put 1 damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Skorupi
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Spoink
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep. Switch Spoink with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Swablu
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Tentacool
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Venonat
Attack1Text: Remove from Venonat the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Volbeat
Attack1Text: If you don't have Illumise in play, this attack does nothing. Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Confused.

name: Voltorb
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage. If tails, Voltorb does 10 damage to itself.

name: Yanma
AbilityText: If Yanma has no Energy attached to it, Yanma's Retreat Cost is 0.
